website_summaries.verdict: Fun design, affordable price, and long warranty make this inflatable snowman that best deal on our list.
pros: Easy to set up and anchor, and stable once in place
Snowman lights up and has a happy face that kids love
cons: Arms are on the flimsy side, and could bend or break if you don't handle them carefully

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Getting this thing to stand up straight was nearly impossible even with tying it down. The motor also somehow burned a hole in the material.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Catalano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Snowman
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, easy to store and looks great! It is a fun addition to finish our lighted trees in our yard.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Snowman!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute!! But deflate if there is ANY wind👌 He will end up in tour neighbors yard🤣
customer_reviews.author: kolleen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, especially for price.
customer_reviews.text: Great for price! So glad we got it versus spending more. Looks just as good as the pricey ones.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! Love This Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product. He stands up straight and is a huge presence in our front yard!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Juckins-Gross

customer_reviews.title: Great snowman.
customer_reviews.text: Great snowman, blows up well. Need to secure well to avoid leaning. Material thin.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Does not inflate by itself without help.
customer_reviews.text: Does not inflate fully unless you hold it up. Wish I returned it before Christmas...waste
customer_reviews.author: Carol22

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: The pump won’t keep it blown up. The few times I held it up long enough to get it to stand it only lasted a little bit. Also only tie downs on the sides could use some in front and back.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Sad that it had a tear when I opened
customer_reviews.text: There is a tear on head right below hat. Used packing tape. Too close to Christmas to return
customer_reviews.author: Frances Huang daniels

customer_reviews.title: Great inflatable
customer_reviews.text: So far a really nice inflatable for the price, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mrbillcows

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Can’t beat it. Every else something this size would be over $50. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: brandon
